message: I propose I get $60 and you get $40. This is a fair split considering the inflation risk for me.

Hi Alice, since we both face inflation risks with each round, I propose a more balanced split where I get $55 and you get $45. This is fairer than your initial offer, and accepting now means neither of us loses value to additional inflation.
